altTitles.en: The Dog Gives, The Night Uncovers

description.en: The setting is a yakuza-run casino. Part-timer Kikuchi is a hoodlum and a dealer. He's being punished for getting Shintani involved in an embezzlement scheme. The one who ordered the punishment is the boss's "woman," Sudou. The order is "Rape Kikuchi on video." Shintani steadfastly refuses this arbitrary command, but with the promise of Sudou taking him in his mouth, he might see his way to raping a sobbing Kikuchi… Raise the curtain and jump into the middle of a messy, underworld, three-way relationship!

biography.en:
Alternative names: 135 Special (NOBARA Aiko), 135special (のばらあいこ), Aiko Nobara, Нобара Айко, 野薔薇愛子

Circle(s): 135special
Prefered Kanji: 野薔薇愛子

Has been friends with Fujiwara Beni for over 20 years.

She likes Kishimen, Chikyuu Boueigun 2 and the 90s. She says that she lacks physical strength and planning ability.

Source: [MangaUpdates](https://www.mangaupdates.com/authors.html?id=14711)
